verses.verse: In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> became his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> then he <S%H7725>turned<s%> and rebelled against <S%H4775>him.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> against him <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> and <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites,<s%> and <S%H1416>bands<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them against <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H1697>it,<s%> according to the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

Surely at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came this on <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to <S%H5493>remove<s%> them out of his <S%H6440>sight,<s%> for the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> according to all that he <S%H6213>did,<s%>

and also for the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> that he <S%H8210>shed;<s%> for he <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H5545>pardon.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> and all that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>
So <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H3318>didn't<s%> come <S%H3254>again<s%> out of his <S%H776>land<s%> any <S%H4428>more;<s%> for the king of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H3947>taken,<s%> from the <S%H5104>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> all that pertained to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> was <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5179>Nehushta<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H494>Elnathan<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> according to all that his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H935>besieged.<s%>
<S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> while his <S%H5650>servants<s%> were besieging <S%H6696>it;<s%>

and <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H517>he,<s%> and his mother, and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and his <S%H5631>officers:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him in the <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

He carried <S%H3318>out<s%> there all the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and cut in <S%H7112>pieces<s%> all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

He carried <S%H1540>away<s%> all <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and all the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and all the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> even <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1540>captives,<s%> and all the <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%> and the <S%H4525>smiths;<s%> none <S%H7604>remained,<s%> <S%H2108>except<s%> the poorest <S%H1803>sort<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

He carried <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H3078>Jehoiachin<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H517>mother,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H802>wives,<s%> and his <S%H5631>officers,<s%> and the <S%H352>chief<s%> men of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3212>carried<s%> he into <S%H1473>captivity<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

All the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>might,<s%> even <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and the <S%H2796>craftsmen<s%> and the <S%H4525>smiths<s%> one <S%H505>thousand,<s%> all of them <S%H1368>strong<s%> and <S%H6213>apt<s%> for <S%H4421>war,<s%> even them the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H1473>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> <S%H1730>Jehoiachin<s%>'s father's brother, <S%H4427>king<s%> is his <S%H5437>place,<s%> and changed his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah.<s%>

<S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H2537>Hamutal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>
He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> according to all that <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

For through the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> it happened in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> until he had cast them <S%H7993>out<s%> from his <S%H6440>presence.<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>
